column3: “It's a very intense body high that strangely acquires effects similar to the name. A Lion is courageous, and after some of this stuff you feel focused, uplifted and determined.”
“Really focused while smoking. The high lasts for hours”
“Amazing aroma. Orange/menthol. Creative and uplifted. Energized. Sure this is an indica? Our first ever. Outstanding via my vaporizer.”

“Would someone please tell me some of the dispensaries that carry these seeds or the name of the dispensary you got your physical marijuana from, I would extremely appreciate it,

Thank you.”
“It's ok. Lots of twigs/stems and a bit dry. Burns fast in my glass. A nice creative head buzz. No munchies effect for me.”
“Long lasting relief. Good body/face relief. Smoked 3 1/2 hours ago and still buzzed. Definitely has skunky/menthol smell, with a touch of citrus.”
